shortdesc.p: Before you can use SkyDRM RMS to create your SharePoint Online App, you must register your SharePoint Online App. The registration process generates Client and Secret Client IDs while also saving the public listed IP address of the machine on which your SkyDRM RMS deployment is hosted.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Before you can use SkyDRM RMS to create your SharePoint Online App, you must register your SharePoint Online App. The registration process generates Client and Secret Client IDs while also saving the public listed IP address of the machine on which your SkyDRM RMS deployment is hosted.

shortdesc.p: After creating the SharePoint Online app, you can upload it to the SharePoint Online App Catalog.

topicmeta.shortdesc: After creating the SharePoint Online app, you can upload it to the SharePoint Online App Catalog.
